CustomField.description: API Name of the Picklist, as "ObjectApiName.FieldApiName" (including "__c" for custom items). If not set, SYS logic uses the MasterLabel instead (e.g. to support long API Names).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: API Name of the Picklist, as "ObjectApiName.FieldApiName" (including "__c" for custom items). If not set, SYS logic uses the MasterLabel instead (e.g. to support long API Names).
CustomField.label: Picklist
